entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: SE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
